creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque made from one hollow ring of silver; ring has three protruding spots, one square on each side, and a half-circle in the middle; connecting piece is covered in coiled and wrapped wire; ends curve over on themselves and have wave-like design on them; torque center has a medallion with a dragon, dragons and birds on either side of medallion; flower design in square protrusions
title: Torque
